full_product_name.product_name: libyang-0:1.0.184-1.el8 as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux AppStream (v. 8)

notes.note: libyang: invalid memory access in resolve_feature_value() when a if-feature is used inside a bit

reference.description: bz#1793934: CVE-2019-20391 libyang: invalid memory access in resolve_feature_value() when a if-feature is used inside a bit

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
